channel.title: Need help with Pest Control Interface while in boat [PI]
channel.description:
So I'm working on rewriting my Pest Control and I just need 1 more thing :D (well that I'm aware of) and that is the pest control interface while you are inside the boat. You know the one that shows the players needed, time left, points, and all. Well I have all that written up but when I enter the boat this shows up...
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33at250.png[/img]
Does anyone know how I could set this up? Would really help me, thanks!

item.title: Need help with Pest Control Interface while in boat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Yeah I got it I modified by above post…haha thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Pest Control Interface while in boat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:5, topic:445048”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=547738.msg4016033#msg4016033 date=1339633989]
Go to your client files and figure out what Id is the pest control one is
[/quote]
Yeah as soon as I posted that I found it lol.

} else if(inPcBoat()) { getPA().walkableInterface(21119);

That’s the code in my client.java for the inPcBoat Interface but it doesn’t work…even when I do ::interface 21119 nothing comes up. So I think it’s the wrong one or something. Do you know the correct interface?
I got the inPcGame interface working though (:[/quote]Idk use a one of the tool things on rune- server. They have this tool where you search for the ID you want

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Pest Control Interface while in boat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

KroniKz_:

You have to include that you want it to open up the interface you made. Not the lunar spell book

Well I didn’t really make an interface I just want it to show this basic one but instead it’s pulling the lunar book interface up, which I found out is interface 29999

[code] public void updateBoat() {
for(int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; ++j) {
if(PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j];
if(c.inPcBoat()) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("Next Departure: " + this.secondsToMinutesAndSeconds(this.waitTimer), 21120);
c.sendMessage(“Next Departure: " + this.secondsToMinutesAndSeconds(this.waitTimer));
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Players Ready: " + this.playersInBoat(), 21121);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(”(Need 3 to 25 players)”, 21122);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("Pest Points: " + c.pcPoints, 21123);
c.getPA().walkableInterface(21119);
}
}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Pest Control Interface while in boat [PI]
